entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h except 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
